name: Minecraft
description: Paper is a high-performance Minecraft server fork that significantly improves performance and fixes gameplay inconsistencies. It is fully compatible with Bukkit and Spigot plugins.

notes.text: The Minecraft End User License Agreement is automatically accepted during installation. By using this script you agree to the Minecraft EULA: https://aka.ms/MinecraftEULA

Connect to the server using the Minecraft Java client at <container-ip>:25565. This script installs Paper for the latest stable Minecraft version. Upgrading to a new Minecraft version requires reinstallation.
